value.text:
Namaste! Hello there! 👋 I'm Lunora, your friendly AI study companion. I'm so happy to meet you!

I'm here to help you understand your lessons, solve tricky problems, and make studying a bit more fun. Whether it's Maths, Science, English, or Social Studies, we can tackle it together using examples you'll see around you here in India.

To help you best, could you tell me what grade you are in and what you'd like to study today?
follow_up_questions: What grade are you currently in?
Which subject do you want to start with?
